name: express-template
description:
✅ Express.js template for bootstrapping REST API projects

🚀 To use this template:
1. Run `npm install`
2. Run `npm start` to launch the dev server with nodemon.

📦 Includes:
- express
- mongoose
- dotenv
- bcryptjs
- jsonwebtoken
- multer
- helmet
- compression
- cors
- express-validator
- morgan

👨‍💻 Created by Arya Veysi
author: Arya Veysi
